title: Yair Rodriguez lights a candle to summon 'St. McGregor' into a UFC showdown
text:
You can add Yair Rodriguez to the list of fighters who want a shot at Conor McGregor.

But “El Pantera” took a slightly different approach than most. Instead of trashing McGregor or throwing shade, he lit up a candle, asking “The Notorious” to make a miracle happen.

“St. McGregor ” @thenotoriousmma make me the miracle. .

The miracle of facing the biggest fans in this world. .

Mexico 🇲🇽 vs Ireland 🇮🇪

.

“San McGregor” @thenotoriousmma hazme el milagro. .

El milagro de enfrentar a los más grandes fans de este mundo.

.

Mexico 🇲🇽 vs Irlanda 🇮🇪 .

#145lbs #155lbs #catchweight.”

McGregor alluded to a Jan. 18 return, and has not competed since his fourth-round submission loss to Khabib Nurmagomedov in 2018 at UFC 229. He mapped out his plans in recent interviews with Russian media, saying he’d like to fight in January, then face the winner of this Saturday’s “BMF” title fight between Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz, which he then hopes would lead to a rematch with Nurmagomedov.

Rodriguez was able to close the chapter on his rivalry with Jeremy Stephens, defeating him by unanimous decision at UFC on ESPN 6 in Boston. While featherweight contender Rodriguez did say he’d be open to fighting McGregor in either a lightweight or catchweight bout, it’s highly unlikely that he is on McGregor’s radar.

I guess it was worth a try.

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.

description: Yair Rodriguez asks Conor McGregor to make a miracle happen and fight him.
